name: Scratch Tower
description:
Scratch Tower is a game I created in the scratch engine and was made for the Zeno Game Jam 6, which had the theme of going up. I enjoyed making it and I hope you enjoy it too.  Sources of the Sound: 

Speech audio: https://app.uberduck.ai/speak#mode=tts-basic&voice=sonic-jaleel

Boss hit sound effect: https://freesound.org/people/Timmeh515/sounds/413300/
